article_title: 3 top industry targets for non-medical benefits
article_text:
In some sectors, road conditions look good. (LHP Photo/Allison Bell)

Sudden changes in the labor market tides may have a big effect on which employers are adopting, and dropping, non-medical health benefits.

Aflac Inc. (NYSE:AFL) has published data supporting that conclusion in a batch of facts drawn from a survey of 1,977 U.S. decision makers of employers with at least three employees. An outside firm conducted the survey in early 2015.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: The valleys make the peaks look all the more alluring.

article_summary:
(LHP Photo/Allison Bell)Sudden changes in the labor market tides may have a big effect on which employers are adopting, and dropping, non-medical health benefits.
In some sectors, road conditions look good.
An outside firm conducted the survey in early 2015.
Aflac Inc. (NYSE:AFL) has published data supporting that conclusion in a batch of facts drawn from a survey of 1,977 U.S. decision makers of employers with at least three employees.
